action.action-desc: Mr. Self introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To amend the mission statement of the United States Military Academy to include the phrase Duty, Honor, Country.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Maintaining Academy Culture and Assuring Retention of Tradition, Honor, and Unity of the Republic Act or the MACARTHUR Act.
It is the sense of Congress that the principles of Duty, Honor, Country should beâ€”

paragraph.text: deeply embedded in the ethos of the United States Military Academy; and

section.header: Modification of united states military academy mission statement
section.text: Not later than 30 days after the date of the enactment of this Act, the Secretary of the Army shall amend the mission statement of the United States Military Academy to include the phrase Duty, Honor, Country.
